title: Grimoire of the Four Impostors
description: Journey into the Occult, Where History is Horror. Presented in six tales, Grimoire of the Four Impostors takes readers on a dark tour of the 17th century, where corners of the world stand in shadow. Here grimoires possess secrets, impostors beguile the unwary, temptation turns macabre, and the night is no friend.
author: Coy Hall
